data.name: Project Warlock - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack comprises 104 tracks amounting to nearly 5 hours of listening, composed exclusively for Project Warlock. Reviewers unanimously acclaimed the game’s music as a brilliant modern take on retro vibes and atmospherics. Project Warlock’s soundtrack is great to listen to when you challenge yourself while not gaming: running, exercising, working or trekking. It is very engaging, and provides a diverse experience reflecting the variety of game’s worlds and levels.

Tracks:

  • Jerry and Luke's Final Theme
  • First Steps - Uranium
  • All That Glitters Is Gold (Hub)
  • Entering Level - Waking The Dead
  • Intermission - Zeus
  • Medieval - Oubliette

data.short_description: The Official Soundtrack comprises 104 tracks amounting to nearly 5 hours of listening, composed exclusively for Project Warlock.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compliant
